task.title: Delete an Account
task.shortdesc: To delete an account perform the steps listed in this topic.

keywords.indexterm: access tasks accounts delete an account

context.note: If there are resources tied to the account that you delete, the resources remain. We recommend that you delete these resources first.

info.p: Use the -r option set to true to delete the account recursively. You don't have to use this option if have already deleted users, keys, and passwords in this account.

step.stepresult: Eucalyptus does not return any message.
